roles.title: Latvia’s Ambassador to the EU
quotes: Before his work with the European Union, Piebalgs was a prominent Latvian politician and diplomat. As Latvia’s Ambassador to the EU, he played a pivotal role in facilitating Latvia’s accession to the European Union.

roles.title: Part-time Professor
quotes: Today Tuesday, May 4, Andris Piebalgs, FSR part-time Professor, will address the G20 representatives at United Nations Environment Programme (UNEP)…

Before his work with the European Union, Piebalgs was a prominent Latvian politician and diplomat. As Latvia’s Ambassador to the EU, he played a pivotal role in facilitating Latvia’s accession to the European Union.
